sections.title: Details
content: Registration Fee: Rs 79/-

sections.title: Structure
content: Themes will be disclosed at the time of the competition by the judges.
Participants have to bring their own material- the necessary art supplies and a drawing board.
Participants will be provided with A3 sheet of good quality.
Participants will be given 15 minutes to set up their table. 3 hours will be given to complete the painting using mentioned media only.
Coordinators will be present at the AnC Arena all the time if any queries or requirements other than mentioned.

sections.title: Guidelines
content: Eligibility: College Students of the age 16-25
Allowed Media: Watercolor, poster colors, acrylics, oils, gouache.
Format:Drawings should be done on A3 sheet.
Submission: JPEG/JPG/PNG file with three stages of progress, named as 'Coloursplash_ParticipantName_ThemeName.'
Folder Access: Ensure Google Drive folder has 'Anyone with link can view/edit' permission.
Prohibited: Image editing, vulgarity, obscenity.

sections.title: Details
content: It is a sketching competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: Themes will be disclosed via Whatsapp after registration.
Materials: Only use of mentioned medium of sketching is permissible. (Pencil, Graphite, Charcoal, Colour pencils.)

sections.title: Rules & Guidelines
content: Rules & Guidelines:
Eligibility: College students, ages 16-25.
Allowed Media: Pencil, graphite, charcoal, color pencils.
Format:Drawings should be done on A3 sheet.
Submission: JPEG/JPG/PNG file with three stages of progress, named as 'GOS_ParticipantName_ThemeName.'
Folder Access: Ensure Google Drive folder has 'Anyone with link can view/edit' permission.
Prohibited: Image editing, vulgarity, obscenity.

sections.title: Details
content: It is a Mandala Art Competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: Themes will be disclosed at the time of the registration.
Participants will submit their Mandala Art through the drive link which will be provided on Whatsapp of the participant after the registration.
Top entries shortlisted by the judge will be displayed in an 'Exhibition' on the college campus on the day of the main fest along with the name of the artist.

sections.title: Rules & Guidelines
content: The competition is open to college students of the age group 16-25 strictly. If the participant is found out of the mentioned age bracket, he/she/they will not be eligible for the judgement of their artwork.
Black and White as well as Colored Mandalas are allowed.
Participants must draw their Mandalas on an A4 sheet paper.
Mandalas can be drawn in any of the following medium: Pastels, Pens, Pencils, Paints and Markers.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.

sections.title: Image Submission Rules:
content: Participants have to submit a .jpeg or .png file with atleast three stages of their work. All files should be in a single folder.
File must be named 'Cirkala_ParticipantName_ThemeName'.
The folder should be uploaded to your personal Google Drive. Access permission must be given to 'Anyone with a link can view/edit'.
The link to your Personal Google Drive should be uploaded to the form shared to you on Whatsapp. The Access permission should be given as stated above.
The file uploaded must be clearly visible for the judgement of the artwork.
Image editing is stricly prohited.
